program main

    implicit none

    integer :: n, i, num, max_freq, a1, a2, result

    integer, dimension(0:1000) :: freq

    character(len=4) :: first_output

    character(len=4) :: s

    ! Read input for first program

    read*, n

    freq = 0

    do i = 1, n

        read*, num

        freq(num) = freq(num) +1

    end do

    ! Find maximum frequency

    max_freq = maxval(freq(1:1000))

    ! Determine first output

    if (mod(n,2) == 0) then

        if (max_freq <= n/2) then

            first_output = "YES"
